ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning)
Purpose: Manages hospital-wide financials, procurement, supply chain, HR and analytics in one platform.
Core Modules & Functions:
• Finance & Accounting: General ledger, accounts payable/receivable, fixed asset management, cost accounting • Supply Chain & Procurement: Vendor management, purchase orders, inventory control, contract management • HR & Payroll: Workforce administration, time & attendance, benefits, talent management (overlap with HRIS) • Analytics & Planning: Financial planning, budgeting tools, operational KPIs, executive dashboards
Architecture & Integration:
• Service-based modules that integrate via middleware (e.g., enterprise service bus) into clinical systems for costing and charge reconciliation • May leverage embedded analytics or integrate with separate BI platforms
Example Software Highlights:
• SAP S/4HANA: Real-time finance in-memory database, integrated procurement, Fiori UX for mobile access • Oracle ERP Cloud: Modular, cloud-native suite, integrated risk management, embedded AI for forecasting
